anime.description: Attraction is a revolutionary interactive anime film by http://anidb.net/cr276 [Morimoto Kouji] of Tokyo-based production studio http://anidb.net/cr738 [4°C] and was requested by INPES (Institut national de prévention et d`éducation) to discourage first-time smokers. The interactive aspect of Morimoto`s anime utilizes the viewer`s web cam and motion alignment to allow the user to move about within the film. Viewers can also interact with objects, listen into conversations, and so on and so forth.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
